title: Optimization of the Generalized Covariance Estimator in Noncausal Processes. (arXiv:2306.14653v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: This paper investigates the performance of the Generalized Covariance estimator (GCov) in estimating mixed causal and noncausal Vector Autoregressive (VAR) models. The GCov estimator is a semi-parametric method that minimizes an objective function without making any assumptions about the error distribution and is based on nonlinear autocovariances to identify the causal and noncausal orders of the mixed VAR. When the number and type of nonlinear autocovariances included in the objective function of a GCov estimator is insufficient/inadequate, or the error density is too close to the Gaussian, identification issues can arise, resulting in local minima in the objective function of the estimator at parameter values associated with incorrect causal and noncausal orders. Then, depending on the starting point, the optimization algorithm may converge to a local minimum, leading to inaccurate estimates. translated_abstract: 本文研究了广义协方差估计器（GCov）在估计混合因果和非因果的向量自回归（VAR）模型中的性能。GCov估计器是一种半参数方法，它最小化目标函数而不对误差分布做出任何假设，并基于非线性自协方差来确定混合VAR的因果和非因果顺序。当目标函数中包含的非线性自协方差的数量和类型不足或不适当时，或误差密度与高斯分布过于接近时，可能会出现识别问题，导致估计器的目标函数在与不正确的因果和非因果顺序相关的参数值处出现局部最小值。然后，根据起始点，优化算法可能会收敛到局部最小值，导致估计不准确。为了解决这个问题，本文提出使用模拟退火（SA）优化算法。
tldr: 本文研究了在非因果过程中混合VAR模型的GCov估计器的性能，并提出了使用SA优化算法来解决识别问题，从而获得更准确的估计结果。
